record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1892. Second row, left to right: Henry Gordon Gale, A. Wyant, George N. Knapp, A. A. Stagg (acting captain, holding football), W. Ruhlkoetter, William Rufus Smith, Charles William Allen, Richard E. Brendeman, John Lemay, and John V. Fradenburg; first row: William John Rapp, Clifford B. McGillivray, Henry Thurston Chase (on floor), J. E. Raycroft, and W. B. Conover.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Remnants of caption-see address book and Stagg Collection. Mounted on board, lots of wear and tear.
